changeSet.sql: UPDATE marathon SET description = substring(description from 0 for 3000), location = substring(location from 0 for 150), discord = substring(discord from 0 for 20);
UPDATE game SET name = substring(name from 0 for 100), description = substring(description from 0 for 500), console = substring(console from 0 for 10), ratio = substring(ratio from 0 for 10);
UPDATE category SET name = substring(name from 0 for 100), description = substring(description from 0 for 300), video = substring(video from 0 for 100);

changeSet.author: gyoo
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO selection(marathon_id, category_id, status) SELECT m.id, c.id, 0 FROM category c LEFT JOIN game g on c.game_id = g.id LEFT JOIN submission s on g.submission_id = s.id LEFT JOIN marathon m on s.marathon_id = m.id

changeSet.sql: UPDATE marathon SET can_edit_submissions = true WHERE submits_open = true OR is_selection_done = true
